name: Wall The Ball - for ScoreSpaceJam #17
description:
Protect the Planet in this hybrid of Reverse-Breakout and Planet Defense.

Can be played with Mouse or Touch Controls.

---

How To Play

You must protect the planet. Build Blocks by tapping or clicking on the grid.

There is a 1 second timer between placement so you cannot spam.

Last as long as you can for the highest score.

---

Made solo by Fatal Exit.
I created all code, graphics, sounds and music from scratch for the jam.

Tools used: Construct 3, Affinity Designer, Chiptone, Fl Studio.

---

Other Assets (just a couple):

I did use an external font which I have a license for: Bedelia Regular.

I used the free Better Outlines and Drops Shadow addon for Construct 3 for Outline FX and Shadowing on Text.

I also used Kind Eye Games' Starfield Shader for Construct 3 in the process of creating the background Shader VFX.
